data.description: I thought I found the perfect deal in Tokyo. But the wall felt unnaturally thick. What I found behind the wallpaper will haunt your dreams forever. Have you ever felt like your room was smaller than it should be? This Japanese Urban Legend (Jiko Bukken) is a warning to everyone looking for cheap rent. Experience the chilling reality of stigmatized properties. Don't forget to like and subscribe for more terrifying J-horror stories from the shadows of Japan. What would you do if you found this? Tell us in the comments below! This story explores the psychological fear of enclosed spaces and the supernatural history of Japan. Keywords: Japanese Horror, Urban Legend, Creepy, Supernatural, Stigmatized Property, Jiko Bukken, Haunted Apartment, Tokyo Ghost Stories.
data.editorial_notes:
【3人のエキスパートによる協議】
1. Viral Architect（マーケター）: タイトル案として「Why My Tokyo Rent is So Cheap」「Never Peel the Wallpaper in a Cheap Room」「Secret Hidden Room in a Cheap Japanese Apartment」の3つを提示。海外でバズりやすい『Japanese Apartment』と好奇心を刺激する『Secret Hidden Room』を組み合わせた3枚目を選定。冒頭1秒で壁に手をかけるシーンから入り、視聴者の離脱を防ぎます。
2. The Whisperer（ホラー作家）: 『湿り気のある恐怖』を強調するため、視覚だけでなく嗅覚や温度（rot, cold breath）に触れる言葉を選定。文末のピリオドを排除し、Vrewでのスムーズな読み上げを実現しました。
3. The Visionary（監督）: Midjourney V6を想定し、35mmレンズの質感と、日本の古びたアパート特有の不気味なライティングを指定。お札（Ofuda）のビジュアルを強調し、後半に向けて視覚的な密度を上げました。
data.vrew_script:
The rent was way too low for Tokyo
But this wall feels unnaturally thick
A small tear in the old wallpaper
Curiosity is a dangerous thing in Japan
Behind the paper lies a hidden gap
Thousands of cursed talismans sealing the void
The air smells of old dust and rot
Something is shifting inside the darkness
Uncountable eyes are blinking back at me
They have been watching me sleep every night
Never peel the wallpaper in a cheap room
